comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Sergio Guardiola is the provider as he slips the ball to Anuar Mohamed Tuhami (Valladolid) who simply steers it home from close range. It's 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) has the simplest of tasks to roll the ball into an empty net from close range after a rebound left the keeper stranded. 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Real Madrid failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: The ball goes out of play. Real Madrid are awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) outjumps the defence inside the six-yard box to meet the corner kick and scores with a great header into the bottom right corner. The goalkeeper had no chance to react. The score is now 1:3.
